main event: A UFO sighting was reported on November 7, 1957 in Greenville, Alabama. The observation was made using ground-radar and lasted for approximately half an hour. The object was described as emitting light and traveling from C.F.S. to S.S.E.
interesting points: The report indicates that there was insufficient data available for a comprehensive analysis.
The UFO was observed traveling from C.F.S. to S.S.E.
It was a ground-radar observation lasting approximately half an hour.
The object emitted light and was described as a luminous streak.
One witness claimed to have heard a noise associated with the UFO.
